cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on January 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4009, Enslaved Voyages Memorial Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 106 (Thursday, June 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 4009.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H2930]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

title: Enslaved Voyages Memorial Act
